==========
 Tutorial
==========

For the Standard User
---------------------

Identify what type of data you have (cross-sectional or time-series) then read about the strengths and weaknesses of each type of approach and pick something suitable. I've compiled a small (and incomplete) list of :doc:`Rules of Thumb </user_guide/rules_of_thumb>` that you can use to aid your decision making. After you've picked your imputation algorithm, 

For the Researcher
------------------
